title: Day 96 – Vibe Coding an App Until I Make $1,000,000 | Revenue: $1,846.98
description:
Day 96 is about closing the loop. Today, we are vibe coding the "Holy Grail" feature for ViewCreator: a fully autonomous Agentic Workflow that goes from raw content creation → scheduling → posting without human intervention.

We are pushing Claude Opus 4.5, Gemini 3 Pro, and Claude Code to their limits inside Cursor to wire up these agents. We’ll also be debugging critical issues in our AI Clipping Agent to ensure perfect cuts every time.

Plus, it’s Community Day: we are hosting the weekly BridgeMind Project Sharing event, where members showcase what they’ve been building.

Links

ViewCreator (Soft Launch): https://www.viewcreator.ai

BridgeMind: https://www.bridgemind.ai

Discord (Join the Project Share): https://bridgemind.ai/discord

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@bridgemindai

X (Twitter): https://twitter.com/bridgemindai

Instagram: https://instagram.com/bridgemindai

Twitch: https://twitch.tv/bridgemindai

What is ViewCreator? ViewCreator is a production AI platform for creators and teams. It generates thumbnails, captions, carousels, and titles, and converts long-form video → shorts using our AI Clipping Agent. The goal is to let creators schedule and post across YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, X, and LinkedIn from a single dashboard. Built on Next.js + NestJS + PostgreSQL on AWS.

What We’ll Do Today

End-to-End Agentic Workflow: Wiring the final connections so a single prompt can trigger generation, review, scheduling, and posting.

Fixing the AI Clipper: Debugging the ffmpeg/rendering pipeline to solve the clipping agent's consistency issues.

Community Project Sharing: Reviewing live demos and code from the BridgeMind community—seeing what you guys are shipping!

Vibe Coding Loops: Using Claude Code for terminal-based refactoring and Opus 4.5 for complex logic inside Cursor.

Keywords: vibe coding, ViewCreator, agentic workflows, AI agents, autonomous content, Claude Opus 4.5, Gemini 3 Pro, Claude Code, Cursor, Next.js, NestJS, PostgreSQL, community showcase, project sharing, build in public, software engineering, AI automation.

#VibeCoding #ViewCreator #AgenticAI #ClaudeOpus45 #Gemini3Pro #Cursor #NextJS #NestJS #BuildInPublic #Community #SoftwareEngineering #BridgeMind #AI

title: Day 103 – Vibe Coding an App Until I Make $1,000,000 | Revenue: $2,086.96
description:
Day 103 is DEPLOY DAY. Today is critical. We are taking all the massive features we've built over the last week—including the new LinkedIn Integration and Agentic Workflows—and pushing them live to production.

But shipping isn't enough; we need scale. We are strictly vibe coding deep optimizations for our AI Clipping Agent, refactoring the FFmpeg pipelines to make it faster, lighter, and significantly less resource-intensive. We need to cut costs and boost speed as our user base grows.

Links

ViewCreator (Soft Launch): https://www.viewcreator.ai

BridgeMind: https://www.bridgemind.ai

Discord (Join the Vibe Coding Community): https://bridgemind.ai/discord

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@bridgemindai

X (Twitter): https://twitter.com/bridgemindai

Instagram: https://instagram.com/bridgemindai

Twitch: https://twitch.tv/bridgemindai

What is ViewCreator? ViewCreator is a production AI platform for creators and teams. It generates thumbnails, captions, carousels, and titles, and converts long-form video → shorts using our AI Clipping Agent. Our goal is to let creators schedule and post across YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, X, and LinkedIn from a single dashboard. Built on Next.js + NestJS + PostgreSQL on AWS.

What We’ll Build Today

Production Deployment: Managing CI/CD pipelines, database migrations, and environment configs to push our v2.1 updates live without downtime.

Clipping Agent Optimization: Refactoring the Python/Node.js handoff and FFmpeg processing to reduce CPU load and slash processing time by 40%.

Resource Management: Implementing smarter queue handling in NestJS to prevent server spikes during high-volume agent runs.

Stability Fixes: Squashing final bugs in the scheduler before the code hits the main branch.

Vibe Coding Stack: Using Claude Opus 4.5 for high-level architectural optimization and Gemini 3 Pro inside Cursor for rapid refactoring.

Keywords: vibe coding, production deployment, clipping agent optimization, FFmpeg, performance tuning, ViewCreator, Claude Opus 4.5, Gemini 3 Pro, Cursor, Warp, Claude Code, Codex, Next.js, NestJS, AWS, software engineering, DevOps.

#VibeCoding #ProductionDay #Optimization #ViewCreator #AI #ClaudeOpus45 #Gemini3Pro #Cursor #Warp #DevOps #SoftwareEngineering #BridgeMind #BuildInPublic

title: Day 99 – Vibe Coding an App Until I Make $1,000,000 | Revenue: $1,926.96
description:
Day 99. One day away from the century mark. Today, we are crossing the finish line on the MVP for Full Agent Automation. We are finalizing the code, testing the loops, and pushing to production live on stream.

We are also dogfooding our own tech: building a custom Agentic Clipping System using ViewCreator specifically for BridgeMind content. This agent will watch, clip, and queue our own highlights automatically.

The Stakes are Higher Today: 🥶 400 Likes: Live Cold Plunge. 🎹 600 Likes: Live Piano Performance.

We are running the SOTA stack—Claude Opus 4.5, Gemini 3 Pro, and Claude Code inside Cursor—to vibe code this into reality.

Links

BridgeMind: https://www.bridgemind.ai

What is ViewCreator? ViewCreator is a production AI platform for creators and teams. It generates thumbnails, captions, carousels, and titles, and converts long-form video → shorts using our AI Clipping Agent. Our goal is to let creators schedule and post across YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, X, and LinkedIn from a single dashboard. Built on Next.js + NestJS + PostgreSQL on AWS.

What We’ll Do Today

Ship the MVP: Final polish and deployment of the fully autonomous Agent Automation engine.

Agentic Clipping System: Building a specialized workflow that monitors BridgeMind streams, identifies viral moments, and auto-clips them using ViewCreator's API.

Production Push: Managing the CI/CD pipeline and database migrations to get these agents live for users.

Challenge Accepted: If we hit the like goals, I’m hitting the ice and the keys.

Vibe Coding: High-velocity shipping using Claude Opus 4.5 for architecture and Gemini 3 Pro for real-time code generation.

Keywords: vibe coding, ViewCreator, agentic workflows, autonomous clipping, MVP launch, cold plunge, piano performance, Claude Opus 4.5, Gemini 3 Pro, Claude Code, Cursor, Next.js, NestJS, PostgreSQL, AWS, software engineering, build in public, creator economy, AI agents.
